#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    string c;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>c;
        int i = 0 ;
        int j = c.length()-1;
        bool b = false;
        while(i<=j)
        {
            if(c[i]==c[j])
            {
                i++;
                j--;
            }
            else
            {
                b = true;
                break;
            }
        }
        if(b)
        {
            cout<<"NO\n";
        }
        else
        {
            cout<<"YES\n";
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
